system.description: Starting at 10th level, the winds of your aura make it difficult for creatures to keep their feet. Once per turn while raging, when you damage a creature with a melee attack you can force the target to make a Strength saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier). On a failure the creature is pushed 10 feet away in a direction of your choosing. This distance stacks with any forced movement caused by a Furious Critical.
